pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Japanese Administration Area and Office Maps // Utilizing the data that Japanese administration area provided by the National Land Numerical Information download service (http://nlftp.mlit.go.jp/ksj/index.html). This package provide map data is based on the Digital Map 25000 (Map Image) published by Geospatial Information Authority of Japan (Approval No.603FY2017 information usage http://www.gsi.go.jp).
